mapper.insert: insert into work_order_material (wom_id, car_id, customer_id, work_order_id, item_name, item_code, price1, price2, price3, quantity, total, description, create_date, create_user_Id, create_user_name, modify_date, modify_user_Id, modify_user_name) values (#{womId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price1,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{price2,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{price3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{total,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
